code: import React from'react';import{NavLink as RouterLink,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{Home,Users,Settings}from'lucide-react';import'./NavMenu.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const navItems=[{path:'/dashboard',label:'Dashboard',icon:Home},{path:'/accounts',label:'Accounts',icon:Users},{path:'/settings',label:'Settings',icon:Settings}];export default function NavMenu(){const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"bg-light border-end d-flex flex-column",style:{width:'220px',minHeight:'100%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{className:"text-muted text-uppercase small fw-bold mb-3",children:"Navigation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"nav flex-column",children:navItems.map(item=>{const Icon=item.icon;const isActive=location.pathname===item.path;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item mb-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(RouterLink,{to:item.path,className:"nav-link d-flex align-items-center px-3 py-2 rounded ".concat(isActive?'bg-primary text-white':'text-dark hover-bg-light'),style:{textDecoration:'none'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{size:18,className:"me-2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.label})]})},item.path);})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-auto p-3 border-top",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{className:"text-muted",children:"CAMS v1.0"})})]});}
